login.welcome_back_please_enter_your_credentia: Welcome back, please enter your credentials
login.no_permission_message: You do not have permission to access the modules
login.you_will_get_insight: You will get insights and metrics on the go, so you can focus on your activity.

sliders.subtitle_1: Create an account and unlock amazing features
sliders.subtitle_2: Connect with others and achieve your goals
sliders.subtitle_3: Sign up now and experience the difference

register.create_your_account: Create your account to get started
register.name: Full Name
register.name_required: Name must be at least 2 characters
register.must_accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions
register.welcome_message: Welcome! Your account has been created.
register.email_already_exists: This email is already registered. Please use a different email or try logging in.

enter-your-email-address-and-well-send-y: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
failed-to-send-reset-link-please-try-aga: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
a-connection-code-will-be-sent-to-your-e: A connection code will be sent to your email address
check-your-inbox-and-follow-the-instruct: Check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
please-check-your-email-and-password: Please check your email and password.
an-error-has-occurred-please-try-again: An error has occurred. Please try again.

errors.imageTooLarge: The image is too large. Please choose an image smaller than 2MB.
errors.invalidImageType: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, or WebP).
errors.invalidDimensions: The image dimensions are invalid. Please upload an image between 200x200 and 4096x4096 pixels.

network-error.title: Connection issue
network-error.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request timed out
timeout.message: The request took too long. Please try again.

not-found.title: Resource not found
not-found.message: The requested item does not exist or has been deleted.

server-error.title: Server error
server-error.message: An internal error occurred. Our team has been notified.

service-unavailable.title: Service unavailable
service-unavailable.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

access-denied.title: Access denied
access-denied.message: You do not have the required permissions for this action.

session-expired.title: Session expired
session-expired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

members.invite-new: Invite new members by email address.

password.title: Password
password.description: Confirm your current password before setting a new one.

errors.same-password: New password must be different from current password

success.title: Password updated
success.description: Your password has been successfully updated.

error.title: Update failed
error.description: Failed to update password. Please try again.

delete-account.title: Delete Account
delete-account.description: No longer want to use our service? You can delete your account here. This action is not reversible. All information related to this account will be deleted permanently.

modal.title: Delete Account
modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
modal.warning-description: All your data, including your profile, settings, and any associated information will be permanently deleted.

success.title: Account deleted
success.description: Your account has been successfully deleted.

error.title: Deletion failed
error.description: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

weekly-digest.label: Weekly digest
weekly-digest.description: Receive a weekly digest of news.

product-updates.label: Product updates
product-updates.description: Receive a monthly email with all new features and updates.

important-updates.label: Important updates
important-updates.description: Receive emails about important updates like security fixes, maintenance, etc.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: This information will be displayed publicly.

name.label: Name
name.description: Will appear on receipts, invoices, and other communication.

email.label: Email
email.description: Used to sign in, for email receipts and product updates.

username.label: Username
username.description: Your unique username for logging in and your profile URL.

bio.label: Bio
bio.description: Brief description for your profile. URLs are hyperlinked.

errors.name-too-short: Name must be at least 2 characters
errors.username-too-short: Username must be at least 2 characters

email.title: Email Address
email.description: Change your email address. You will receive a confirmation email at the new address.

errors.same-email: New email must be different from current email

success.title: Verification email sent
success.description: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to confirm your new email address.

error.title: Request failed
error.description: Failed to request email change. Please try again.

info.title: Important Information
info.note: When you request an email change, we will send a verification email to your new address. You must click the link in that email to complete the change. Your current email will remain active until the change is confirmed.
